column5: My question is,what would you do if this board went down for a couple of days say a week? No Im not going to hack it.LOL  Lots of us come here to enjoy and relax with good friends and make it our safe haven.  "WHAT WOULD YOU DO"   Reason I ask,I am finding that the WWW is getting ahold of me WAY TO MUCH.   Interested in your thoughts.
probably get a lot more work done

I for sure would miss it, but I have so many things always going on that losing some is sometimes a blessing. It's hard to keep up with everything all the time. So I post when I feel like it, here and other boards, and read up when I can, but I don't sweat it if I miss anything.  Appreciate what you got and then you'll be thankful for what you had.
Socialize Exercise Angle-ize
NO wrries ...  Rick will make sure that never happens.
I would not want to find out what I would do.... Could be very stressful to not get my daily fishing fix for on those days when I can't get out.
Shop...look at men's shoes.  haha, sorry couldn't resist, still affected by previous thread.
L M A O CH  Good one
have a lot more free time
What size are you shoes again???  LOL Thanks for the laugh.
Brian  Face it your addicted i myself would get alot more done  my question is what would you do if the whole www thing went down for a while again i would get alot more done
Exactly.
I'd just sit and blubber like a baby  Maureen

Hmmm...let's see...get to know my kids again, maybe shave, cut the grass for the first time this year, you know, things like that...LOL.  It is an addicting place...I'm glad I stumbled upon it last year.
Up at 07:00 am, just going to read my mail, check the weather...next thing I know it's 10:00 am...Damn 'puter...but I'd sure miss the internet if it shut down...

That why ya getting High-speed Beans?? So ya can get done by 9:00am and get more fishing done???  For myself; I've purposely cut down my time on the 'Board. 3 - 4 hrs a night was giving me square eyeballs [Dialup] and besides, many of the Threads, seem to be repeats!

Well, first off it would give me lots more time in the morning.  I usually spend the first 15 minutes of my morning catching up.  Just this morning my wife asked me "do you HAVE to go straight to the computer after you get the coffee going?", I think we all know the answer to this.  I think without it would be like not having a coffee, wouldn't be able to function.  Now, if the internet went down, that would be awsome!!!   I'd get to go fishing since 75% of my work depends on the internet being there.  Gotta love the times when the network breaks at work, coffee break for everyone!
I'd probably end up missing the whole event, I always seem to miss when something goes on around here.
Ontario birth rate will get way up 10 months later.
I'd save a few people from having to see my ugly face for a couple of days.
Lets see... -do my '06 taxes -finish building my shed from summer '05 -finish trim work in the basement from '04 -probably put some sealer on the fence I built in '97
